name: Bellettini Hotel

reviews.title: A Real Pleasure
reviews.text: I was very pleased with the hotel during my stay there in January, 2006. It's a half block from the San Lorenzo street fair and only a few blocks from the Duomo, and a manageable walk from the train station (even with a very large bag). The staff was very friendly, the breakfast good, and I never had any problem using the free internet connection. There is a lift to the hotel lobby, but my room was on the 2nd floor, which is only accessible by stairs. If you overpack, as I do, this may not be ideal if you're only staying a day or two, but there weren't many stairs and it was well worth it for me since they gave me a very large double room in spite of my being a single. I will definitely make the Belletini my first choice for future trips to Firenze.

reviews.title: What a good find.
reviews.text: I chose this hotel after reading previous reviews and also because it had a great deal on room prices.still not sure what to expect as all views subjective. however it is in a great position for sightseeing,the single room was fine altho a little dark and would probably be noisy in summer with the shutters open.

reviews.title: Big room, small bathroom
reviews.text: a very good breakfast and pleasant friendly staff.one word of warning -most rooms are up stairs at various levels-altho there is a lift from street level to reception.would certainly stay here again.

Our review of this hotel is hot and cold. We stayed in room 44. The bedroom was large and seemed to have nothing wrong with it. An added plus…was our very nice deck/patio off our room. It didn’t have a view…but was nice to go outside and have lunch and some vino. It was a very quiet spot…there was no noise from any of the other rooms or the city.
reviews.title: Good location and clean, but over-rated!

description: The Hotel Bellettini is located in the historical center of Florence near the most important museums and church. Near the reception there is a little bar for the guest. We are at your disposal to help you during your stay to do restaurants and museums reservations, tours, arrange train tickets.
